title: Author a Clinical Study Report
description: A medical writer must author a clinical study report (CSR) following the analysis of a completed trial.

tasks.description: Generate a CSR shell document using an ICH E3 compliant template.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new CSR document with all the required sections and headings.

tasks.description: Import the final tables, listings, and figures (TLFs) from the biostatistics department.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully embeds the statistical outputs into the CSR.

tasks.description: Write the narrative sections of the report, interpreting the results and summarizing the study's conclusions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes a clear and accurate interpretation of the study data.

tasks.description: Route the draft CSR for review by the cross-functional study team.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent circulates the draft for review and comment.
